digitalTwinScoringFramework.description: Complete scoring logic for Digital Twin Career Assessment - 10 dimensions × 10 options (a-j)

questions.question: How connected do you feel to your deeper purpose through your current professional role?
questions.measure: Measures how deeply work aligns with your inner purpose & evolving identity.

scoringOptions.text: I feel deeply aligned — my work expresses who I am becoming.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your work and purpose move as one — rare alignment.
scoringOptions.title: Your Inner Compass: The Power of Being in Alignment
scoringOptions.keyInsight:
Your response reflects a rare and powerful Identity Emotional Story — the story of someone whose work and inner self are finally speaking the same language. This level of alignment does not happen by accident; it is a signal that your values, talents, and personal evolution are moving in the same direction. The Purpose Alignment Root Cause behind this is clarity: you know what you stand for, and your work is becoming a natural extension of that truth. It also indicates emotional maturity and deep self-awareness — you've done the inner work required to recognise what feels right and what doesn't.

But even in alignment, there is always a Growth Blocker hidden in the corners. For you, it is not misalignment — it is complacency. People who feel aligned often forget to stretch further. The danger is not confusion; it is settling for "good" when "extraordinary" is possible. Yet your Inner Compass Strength is exceptional — you have a strong intuitive radar that knows when something is right for your evolution. This intuition allows you to make bold decisions that others are afraid to make.

Beneath this sits an Identity-Based Hidden Desire: you don't just want alignment — you want expansion. You want to shape something larger than yourself, express your uniqueness at scale, and build a legacy beyond daily work. Your Purpose-Driven Future Self is someone who leads with clarity, inspires with authenticity, and stands out because your identity and impact are inseparable.

Your Identity Archetype is "The Aligned Visionary" — someone who grows not from force, but from inner truth. To strengthen this alignment, follow your Identity Reset Micro-Actions:

Next 24 hours: Write a one-line statement about who you are becoming — and ensure it feels alive.

Next 7 days: Identify one part of your work that deserves a bigger spotlight or bolder expression.

Next 30 days: Begin integrating a new behaviour, project, or ritual that expands your identity, not just maintains it.

Your Identity Fit Index indicates a high alignment, but not a destination — a launchpad. Your role supports your identity today, but your future self will require more influence, more creativity, and a wider stage. Finally, the Digital Twin (Identity Edition) whispers a gentle truth: "You're on the right path — but the next version of you is waiting for a bigger canvas."
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Complacency - settling for good when extraordinary is possible
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Strong intuitive radar that knows when something is right
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Expansion - shape something larger, express uniqueness at scale
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Leader who leads with clarity, inspires with authenticity

microActions.hours24: Write a one-line statement about who you are becoming — and ensure it feels alive.
microActions.days7: Identify one part of your work that deserves a bigger spotlight or bolder expression.
microActions.days30: Begin integrating a new behaviour, project, or ritual that expands your identity, not just maintains it.

scoringOptions.text: I feel meaning occasionally, but it's inconsistent or fragile.
scoringOptions.depiction: You feel meaning, but it flickers instead of flowing.
scoringOptions.title: Your Identity Signal: Meaning Exists, But It Needs Strengthening
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reflects an Identity Emotional Story of partial alignment — moments where your work feels meaningful, but the connection doesn't hold long enough.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Fragmentation - life lived in pockets of meaning rather than steady rhythm
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: You recognise when something feels meaningful
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Stability - work to reflect identity consistently, not in scattered moments
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who builds a life where meaning is the baseline

microActions.hours24: Identify one moment this week where you felt most yourself.
microActions.days7: Pinpoint what created that meaning and how to repeat it.
microActions.days30: Integrate one aligned behaviour or responsibility into your weekly rhythm.

scoringOptions.text: I like what I do, but I'm not sure it reflects my deeper purpose.
scoringOptions.depiction: You enjoy the work, but your deeper purpose hasn't joined the conversation yet.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Gap: When Liking Your Work Isn't the Same as Living Your Purpose
scoringOptions.keyInsight: This response carries an Identity Emotional Story rooted in comfort without fulfilment. You appreciate what you do, but something in your inner world knows there is more.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Functional satisfaction - the kind of comfort that slows deeper transformation
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: You can sense misalignment even when things are good
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Depth - work that expresses something core, meaningful, something only you can bring
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone whose contribution feels personal, not just professional

microActions.hours24: Reflect on one thing your soul wishes you could express more.
microActions.days7: Identify where your current work allows even a small piece of your deeper self to show.
microActions.days30: Add or request one activity that aligns with your inner purpose.

scoringOptions.text: I've grown detached — it feels like I'm on autopilot most days.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're functioning, but your identity is asleep at the wheel.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Numbness: When Your Inner Self Goes Quiet
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals an Identity Emotional Story marked by numbness — a sense of moving through your days without true presence.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Identity drift - the gap between who you are and what you do widens slowly
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Detachment itself is a signal - your identity's way of saying this doesn't feed me
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Awakening - you want to feel alive again, reconnect with meaningful work
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who works with intention, presence, and emotional involvement

microActions.hours24: Do one task today with full presence — no rush, no autopilot.
microActions.days7: Identify what part of your work you feel most emotionally absent from.
microActions.days30: Introduce or revive one activity that feels emotionally meaningful, even if small.

scoringOptions.text: My purpose is clear, but my work does not support it yet.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your purpose is clear — your work simply hasn't caught up yet.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Tension: When Your Purpose is Ready but Your Environment Isn't
scoringOptions.keyInsight: This choice embodies an Identity Emotional Story of clarity without expression. You know who you are becoming, but your current role does not yet provide the space.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Structural mismatch - internal evolution has outpaced external environment
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Clarity of purpose - one of the strongest indicators of future leadership
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Amplification - environment that matches ambition, aligns with values, honours purpose
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who leads with intention and expresses identity through high-impact work

microActions.hours24: Write down your purpose in a single sentence — keep it visible.
microActions.days7: Identify one area of your current work where your purpose can be expressed, even partially.
microActions.days30: Begin aligning your external ecosystem — conversations, roles, projects — with your internal purpose.

scoringOptions.text: I sense an emerging purpose, but I can't articulate it fully.
scoringOptions.depiction: You sense a calling forming beneath the surface, waiting to be articulated.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Emergence: When Your Next Purpose Is Still Forming
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response tells an Identity Emotional Story of quiet transformation — a purpose that is forming beneath the surface, not yet fully shaped.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Uncertainty - fertile kind that precedes breakthroughs
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Intuition - you can feel the shift even before it becomes rational
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Direction - you want your purpose to come into focus, to name and integrate it
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who finds clarity through experimentation, exploration, exposure

microActions.hours24: Notice what topics or conversations spark you unexpectedly.
microActions.days7: Document patterns in what energizes you and what drains you.
microActions.days30: Begin a small exploration project (learning, mentoring, experimenting) to test your emerging purpose.

scoringOptions.text: I'm questioning everything — my identity, values, direction.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're questioning everything — a powerful sign of deeper truth emerging.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Disruption: When Questioning Becomes the Beginning
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals an intense Identity Emotional Story — one where the old version of you no longer fits, and the new version has not yet fully formed.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Overwhelm - when too many identity layers shift at once, clarity gets clouded
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Awakening - questioning is not confusion, it is awareness
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Truth - a desire to know who you are without conditioning or expectation
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone grounded, self-defined, internally anchored

microActions.hours24: Write down the top 3 things you are no longer willing to tolerate from your old identity.
microActions.days7: Describe moments where you felt like your true self—notice patterns.
microActions.days30: Begin removing one identity-layer you've outgrown (role, behaviour, expectation, belief).

scoringOptions.text: I feel stuck in a role that no longer fits who I'm becoming.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're outgrowing a role that no longer matches who you're becoming.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Mismatch: When You've Outgrown Your Role
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a clear Identity Emotional Story of containment — a sense of being too big for the box you're currently in.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Misfit - outer responsibilities no longer match inner capabilities or aspirations
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Growth-awareness - you can feel the misalignment sharply
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Expansion - a role that reflects your emerging self, not your past self
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who steps into larger responsibilities, deeper meaning, higher influence

microActions.hours24: List one responsibility you've outgrown and one you want to grow into.
microActions.days7: Identify the environments where your emerging identity fits better.
microActions.days30: Initiate a role redesign conversation or begin pursuing opportunities aligned with new identity.

scoringOptions.text: I don't know my purpose, but I feel a pull toward something new.
scoringOptions.depiction: You don't know the purpose yet, but something is pulling you forward.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Pull: When Something New Calls Before You Know Its Name
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer illustrates an Identity Emotional Story of curiosity mixed with uncertainty. A shift is happening at a subconscious level before it becomes conscious.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Lack of direction - you sense movement, but cannot yet define it
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: You feel the pull even without seeing destination - your identity is alive
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Exploration - discover what's next rather than commit prematurely
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who uncovers clarity through action, experimentation, exposure

microActions.hours24: Write down what you feel pulled away from — clarity often begins there.
microActions.days7: Experiment with one new idea, project, or domain to test the pull.
microActions.days30: Begin documenting identity patterns that show up repeatedly — themes emerge.

scoringOptions.text: I'm reinventing myself and searching for a more meaningful identity.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're shedding an old identity and searching for the one that fits your next life chapter.
scoringOptions.title: The Identity Rebirth: You're Actively Becoming Someone New
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response expresses an Identity Emotional Story of active reinvention — you're not stuck, lost, or confused; you're reconstructing yourself with intention.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Redefinition fatigue - shaping a new identity requires emotional and cognitive energy
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Powerful intentionality - you're choosing who you want to become
scoringOptions.hiddenDesire: Meaningful reinvention - an identity that resonates deeply rather than superficially
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone grounded, intentional, expressive, purpose-led

microActions.hours24: Define one trait your next self must embody.
microActions.days7: Engage in an activity or decision that reflects that new identity trait.
microActions.days30: Start eliminating one behaviour or belief that belongs to your old identity.

questions.question: When do you most experience flow or 'lose track of time' while working?
questions.measure: Measures how consistently and powerfully you access flow through natural strengths.

scoringOptions.text: When solving problems that stretch me intellectually.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your mind comes alive when a challenge stretches your intelligence.
scoringOptions.title: Your Cognitive Edge: The Power of Deep Problem-Solving Flow
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response tells a Flow Emotional Story of mental expansion — the feeling of being fully alive when a challenge requires depth, logic, and intellectual stretch. The Strength Activation Pattern here is analytical depth; your mind thrives when pushed beyond comfort.
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Deep thinking and natural movement toward complexity
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who leads through expertise, logic, insight, and strategic clarity

microActions.hours24: Protect 30 minutes for uninterrupted deep thinking
microActions.days7: Identify your highest-complexity task and work on it during peak energy
microActions.days30: Redesign one part of your workflow to include regular deep-work blocks

scoringOptions.text: When I'm creating, building, or designing something new.
scoringOptions.depiction: You enter deep flow when you're building or designing something new.
scoringOptions.title: Your Creative Engine: Innovation Is Your Natural State
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals a Flow Emotional Story of creative ignition — you enter flow when imagination and structure meet to form something new.
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Creator's mind with ability to build and innovate
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who leads through originality and bold thinking

microActions.hours24: Start or sketch one creative idea — even a small one
microActions.days7: Dedicate a creative block (no pressure, just exploration)
microActions.days30: Begin a mini-project that embodies your creative identity

scoringOptions.text: When I'm helping people, coaching, or empowering others.
scoringOptions.depiction: You lose track of time when you're uplifting, coaching, or enabling others.
scoringOptions.title: Your Empowerment Strength: You Grow When Others Grow
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a Flow Emotional Story shaped by connection — you feel most alive when you help others rise.
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Ability to translate insight into impact for others
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: A trusted guide, mentor, or leader who uplifts others

microActions.hours24: Offer one person a genuine moment of guidance or listening
microActions.days7: Identify the types of people you naturally empower best
microActions.days30: Initiate a recurring coaching, mentoring, or peer-support activity

scoringOptions.text: When I'm organizing chaos and bringing clarity to complexity.
scoringOptions.depiction: You thrive when you turn chaos into clarity and structure.
scoringOptions.title: Your Clarity Superpower: Turning Chaos Into Order
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reflects a unique Flow Emotional Story — the satisfaction and calm that arise when you transform confusion into coherence.
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Natural ability to impose clarity on chaos with precision
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: The go-to person for strategy, structure, and simplifying complexity

microActions.hours24: Clean up one chaotic area of your workflow or inbox
microActions.days7: Design or refine one process that removes friction
microActions.days30: Build a simple framework or system that brings recurring clarity to a complex problem

scoringOptions.text: When I'm analyzing patterns, data, or systems.
scoringOptions.depiction: Patterns, systems, and data unlock your strongest flow state.
scoringOptions.title: Your Pattern-Mind: Seeing What Others Miss
scoringOptions.keyInsight: This choice reveals a Flow Emotional Story rooted in discovery — you feel most alive when uncovering insights hidden beneath the surface.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Noise and tasks demanding speed over depth
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Highly valued for intelligent analysis and sharp insight

microActions.hours24: Analyze one small pattern in your current work — numbers, behaviour, or outcomes
microActions.days7: Build a simple dashboard, sheet, or list that tracks a meaningful pattern
microActions.days30: Conduct a deeper analysis project that gives you a new perspective on your domain

scoringOptions.text: When I'm strategizing about the future or long-term direction.
scoringOptions.depiction: You flow best when thinking long-term, shaping direction, and imagining futures.
scoringOptions.title: Your Strategic Mind: Seeing Tomorrow Before Others Do
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a Flow Emotional Story shaped by vision — you thrive when you look beyond today and imagine what could be.
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Ability to see patterns of possibility far ahead of others
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Strategic leader or visionary role

microActions.hours24: Write down one long-term possibility or idea you believe in
microActions.days7: Create a simple 6-month or 1-year vision map for one area of your work or life
microActions.days30: Lead or initiate a strategic conversation with your team or stakeholders

scoringOptions.text: When I'm collaborating with motivated, high-energy people.
scoringOptions.depiction: You enter flow when working alongside driven, high-energy people.
scoringOptions.title: Your Collaboration Genius: You Rise in High-Energy Environments
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals a Flow Emotional Story built around connection, shared momentum, and collective intelligence.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Thrives in collaborative leadership and co-creation

microActions.hours24: Connect with one high-energy colleague and share ideas
microActions.days7: Join or initiate a small group/crew that shares your ambition
microActions.days30: Commit to a collaborative project that energizes you

scoringOptions.text: When I'm working independently without interruptions.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your deepest flow emerges in solitude, without interruptions.
scoringOptions.title: Your Deep Independence: Flow Through Focused Solitude
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response expresses a Flow Emotional Story anchored in solitude, clarity, and control over your mental space.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Known for precision, depth, and high-quality execution

microActions.hours24: Block a 45-minute uninterrupted deep-work session
microActions.days7: Build a ritual or environment that signals focus time to others
microActions.days30: Restructure part of your workflow to protect regular focus blocks

scoringOptions.text: I rarely experience flow — work feels fragmented or draining.
scoringOptions.depiction: Flow is rare because your work is too scattered to sustain deep concentration.
scoringOptions.title: Your Flow Breakdown: When Fragmentation Blocks Your Strengths
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your selection reveals a Flow Emotional Story of fragmentation and fatigue — a lack of sustained focus or meaningful engagement in your work.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Performer who rediscovers strengths once freed from overwhelm

microActions.hours24: Eliminate or delegate one draining micro-task
microActions.days7: Identify your top three weekly priorities and protect them
microActions.days30: Redesign your workflow to reduce task-switching and increase focus blocks

scoringOptions.text: I don't know yet — my strengths feel undeveloped or hidden.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your real strengths are still hidden — flow hasn't found its doorway yet.
scoringOptions.title: Your Hidden Potential: When Strengths Are Waiting to Be Born
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer tells a Flow Emotional Story of early-stage discovery — a sense of having potential but not yet knowing its expression.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Confident and centred once strengths crystallize

microActions.hours24: Try one new task or method, even briefly — observe what feels natural
microActions.days7: Experiment with different roles, activities, or contexts to see what energizes you
microActions.days30: Create a strength-discovery journal tracking what feels draining vs energizing

questions.question: How do you perceive your current career growth trajectory?
questions.measure: Captures the true trajectory—accelerating, plateauing, drifting, or pivot-ready.

scoringOptions.text: Upward and accelerating — I'm gaining momentum.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your trajectory is in lift-off mode — momentum is unmistakable.
scoringOptions.title: Your Momentum Curve: You Are Rising Faster Than You Realize
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals a powerful Trajectory Emotional Story — the excitement and inner certainty that come when your work starts compounding.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Overextension - saying yes to too much
scoringOptions.hiddenStrength: Responsiveness and ability to convert feedback into action
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who becomes unstoppable once aligned

microActions.hours24: Identify the one area where momentum is strongest — double down on it
microActions.days7: Review and eliminate one non-essential task that slows your acceleration
microActions.days30: Proactively initiate a move (project, visibility, relationship) that amplifies your current trajectory

scoringOptions.text: Growing steadily but not exponentially.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're growing well, but not yet compounding exponentially.
scoringOptions.title: Your Steady Ascent: Slow, Stable, and Full of Untapped Potential
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a calm, grounded Trajectory Emotional Story — you are growing, but at a measured pace.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who blends calmness with ambition

microActions.hours24: Identify one area where you can increase difficulty or complexity
microActions.days7: Take on a task that requires new capabilities or visibility
microActions.days30: Initiate one growth conversation with your manager or stakeholder

scoringOptions.text: Stable, predictable, and comfortable.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your path is steady and predictable — safe but not stretching.
scoringOptions.title: Your Comfort Plateau: Safe but Limiting
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals a Trajectory Emotional Story of calm stability — a plateau that feels secure, structured, and manageable.
scoringOptions.growthBlocker: Comfort — the subtle inertia that keeps you from exploring
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who needs intentional disruption to grow

microActions.hours24: Identify one area where you feel under-challenged
microActions.days7: Volunteer for a task that pushes you into a new skill zone
microActions.days30: Start a project, certification, or initiative that breaks predictability

scoringOptions.text: Growing externally, but internally I feel stagnant.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're progressing on paper but not evolving within.
scoringOptions.title: The Dual-Trajectory Conflict: When Your Growth Looks Good but Feels Empty
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a powerful Trajectory Emotional Story — the tension between external success and internal stagnation.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who outgrows the image of success

microActions.hours24: Identify one area where your work feels emotionally or intellectually under-stimulating
microActions.days7: Choose one project or activity that develops you, not just your résumé
microActions.days30: Initiate a shift toward roles or responsibilities that feel identity-aligned

scoringOptions.text: I'm plateauing — growth feels slower than it should.
scoringOptions.depiction: You feel the slowdown — growth is happening but too slowly.
scoringOptions.title: The Plateau Moment: You've Hit a Level That No Longer Stretches You
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice tells a clear Trajectory Emotional Story — the awareness that your momentum has slowed, even though your capability hasn't.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who needs a strategic push to rise again

microActions.hours24: Identify the top 1–2 decisions where lack of guidance hurts your progress
microActions.days7: Find a stretch opportunity (project, responsibility, skill) that excites you
microActions.days30: Begin the repositioning process — visibility, mentorship, or role-expansion steps

scoringOptions.text: My trajectory is unclear — I'm still finding the path.
scoringOptions.depiction: The road ahead is foggy — you're still discovering the right direction.
scoringOptions.title: The Exploration Phase: When Clarity Comes After Discovery
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reflects a gentle Trajectory Emotional Story of ambiguity mixed with possibility.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone whose path reveals itself through exploration

microActions.hours24: Write down the top three things you don't want in your career — clarity often starts here
microActions.days7: Explore one field, role, skill, or project that sparks curiosity
microActions.days30: Track patterns: what energizes you vs what drains you — this reveals direction

scoringOptions.text: I feel misaligned — I'm growing, but in the wrong direction.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're growing — but in a direction that doesn't feel like yours.
scoringOptions.title: The Off-Path Acceleration: Growing Fast, But Not Where It Matters
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a sharp Trajectory Emotional Story — you are progressing, moving, achieving, but not toward the life or identity you want.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who must shift direction, not speed

microActions.hours24: Write down the top two ways your path feels misaligned
microActions.days7: Identify which direction does feel true — even if not fully clear yet
microActions.days30: Begin reorienting one part of your work or ecosystem toward your authentic direction

scoringOptions.text: I've hit a wall — progress feels blocked or political.
scoringOptions.depiction: You've hit a wall — politics, systems, or barriers are stalling you.
scoringOptions.title: The Blocked Trajectory: When External Forces Restrict Internal Potential
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response tells a heavy Trajectory Emotional Story — one of frustration, resistance, and invisible ceilings.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who must choose whether to climb over or walk around

microActions.hours24: Identify the real source of the block — person, system, structure, or culture
microActions.days7: Adjust your influence strategy — allies, visibility, skill amplification
microActions.days30: Begin evaluating alternative pathways (internal shift or external move)

scoringOptions.text: I'm preparing for a major pivot, even if it's not visible yet.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're preparing quietly for a major shift — the signs of reinvention have begun.
scoringOptions.title: The Quiet Pivot: Your Next Chapter is Already in Motion
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals an exciting Trajectory Emotional Story — transition beneath the surface.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone whose external actions catch up with internal clarity

microActions.hours24: Write down the one sentence describing the pivot you're preparing for
microActions.days7: Take one visible step — learning, networking, exploring — that signals the pivot
microActions.days30: Begin shaping your ecosystem (skills, network, identity) toward the new direction

scoringOptions.text: I feel lost — I don't know where this path is taking me.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're moving without a compass — clarity and direction need rebuilding.
scoringOptions.title: The Drift Phase: When Lostness Is the First Step to Reinvention
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer expresses a vulnerable and honest Trajectory Emotional Story — the feeling of walking through fog with no clear direction.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone whose path reveals itself through exploration

microActions.hours24: Write down what feels wrong or misaligned — clarity starts by eliminating what no longer fits
microActions.days7: Explore three different themes, skills, or directions without pressure to commit
microActions.days30: Observe patterns in what excites, calms, or energizes you — these form your foundation

questions.question: Which statement best describes your emotional relationship with work right now?
questions.measure: Measures emotional connection, energy quality, and psychological engagement with work.

scoringOptions.text: I feel energized — work stretches me in meaningful ways.
scoringOptions.depiction: Work stretches you in the right ways — emotional energy is fully alive.
scoringOptions.title: Your Emotional Peak Zone: The Energy of Meaningful Stretch
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a vibrant Work-Emotion Story — the sensation of being stretched in ways that feel stimulating rather than draining.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who thrives in high-growth environments

microActions.hours24: Note which activities elevate your energy — they reveal your growth zones
microActions.days7: Protect 1–2 high-energy blocks for deep, meaningful work
microActions.days30: Expand your role by adding a challenge that fuels your momentum

scoringOptions.text: I feel engaged but wish my emotional connection was deeper.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're invested, but you crave a deeper emotional resonance with your work.
scoringOptions.title: The Half-Full Engagement: Present, But Not Fully Alive
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reflects a subtle Work-Emotion Story — you are involved, committed, and attentive, but something deeper is missing.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone seeking authenticity and emotional alignment

microActions.hours24: Identify which tasks feel meaningful vs mechanical
microActions.days7: Add emotional texture — connect with a colleague, impact story, or purpose-driven task
microActions.days30: Initiate a shift toward responsibilities that give you a sense of emotional ownership

scoringOptions.text: I feel neutral — work gets done, but it doesn't move me.
scoringOptions.depiction: Work gets done, but it doesn't touch your emotional core.
scoringOptions.title: The Emotional Flatline: When Work Feels Functional, Not Fulfilling
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a calm yet concerning Work-Emotion Story — work has become transactional rather than transformational.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone seeking emotional fulfillment

microActions.hours24: Identify one part of your work that once excited you — reclaim a piece of it
microActions.days7: Introduce a small new challenge, idea, or responsibility into your routine
microActions.days30: Reposition your role around tasks that stimulate meaning, not just efficiency

scoringOptions.text: I feel emotionally distant — like I'm watching myself work.
scoringOptions.depiction: You see yourself working from the outside — emotional distance is growing.
scoringOptions.title: The Disconnected Self: When You Become the Observer, Not the Participant
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals a profound Work-Emotion Story — one where you feel like you are performing your role rather than living it.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who feels deeply involved

microActions.hours24: Pause and notice when the emotional disconnect is strongest — mornings, meetings, certain tasks?
microActions.days7: Introduce one emotionally meaningful activity into your workflow — storytelling, mentoring, creativity
microActions.days30: Realign your responsibilities to include tasks that engage your emotional identity

scoringOptions.text: I'm productive, but I've lost joy and spark in the process.
scoringOptions.depiction: Productivity is intact, but the spark has faded quietly underneath.
scoringOptions.title: The Joy Drop: When Performance Continues But Passion Fades
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a bittersweet Work-Emotion Story — you are performing well, but joy has leaked out of the experience.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone whose productivity is matched by passion

microActions.hours24: Identify the exact moment you felt joy last — what triggered it?
microActions.days7: Add one joy-restoring element into your work (learning, experimentation, autonomy)
microActions.days30: Rebuild part of your role around tasks that genuinely excite you

scoringOptions.text: I feel drained — not because of work, but because of constant context switching.
scoringOptions.depiction: Too many shifts are draining your emotional bandwidth.
scoringOptions.title: The Fragmentation Drain: When Your Brain Is Pulled in Too Many Directions
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your selection reveals a Work-Emotion Story dominated by cognitive overload rather than emotional disengagement.

microActions.hours24: Remove or batch one category of tasks to reduce switching

scoringOptions.text: Work feels heavier lately — small things take more emotional effort.

scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a telling Work-Emotion Story — heaviness creeping in where ease once existed.

scoringOptions.text: I feel undervalued or unseen, which affects my energy.

questions.question: How would you describe your typical weekly energy and workload experience?
questions.measure: Assesses energy rhythm, overload patterns, and burnout thresholds.

scoringOptions.text: Balanced — I end most weeks with fuel left in the tank.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your weekly rhythm is healthy — energy remains steady with room to grow.
scoringOptions.title: Your Energy Equilibrium: A Rare State of Sustainable Growth
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reflects a healthy Energy Story — you are managing your workload in a way that sustains performance without consuming your emotional reserves.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who elevates performance without sacrificing health

microActions.hours24: Identify one ritual that currently preserves your balance — protect it
microActions.days7: Add a small energy-positive habit (sleep window, walk, reflection time)
microActions.days30: Redesign or streamline one recurring task to reduce friction

scoringOptions.text: Manageable — some weeks are heavy, but I recover well.

scoringOptions.title: The Adaptive Energy Rhythm: You Bend Without Breaking
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reveals an Energy Story of resilience — you experience fluctuations, but you recover quickly and maintain good emotional stability.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who maintains high performance without absorbing unnecessary volatility

microActions.hours24: List the 1–2 triggers that make some weeks heavier

scoringOptions.text: Sustained pressure — doable but tiring.

scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response tells a very real Energy Story — you can handle the work, but the ongoing pressure is slowly grinding your emotional and mental reserves.

microActions.days30: Redesign a small part of your workload or routine to reduce ongoing strain

scoringOptions.text: Always 'on' — difficult to disconnect fully.

scoringOptions.text: Overextended — I manage, but barely.

questions.question: If you could change one cultural aspect of your workplace, what would it be?
questions.measure: Shows what cultural shift your system is craving — trust, safety, recognition, etc.

scoringOptions.text: More transparency in communication and decisions.
scoringOptions.depiction: You thrive in truth-first cultures — clarity fuels your best work.
scoringOptions.title: The Clarity Craving: When Opacity Erodes Emotional Safety
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a significant Culture–Emotion Story — you thrive in environments where truth is shared openly, decisions are explained, and ambiguity is minimized.

scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone operating in environments that respect open communication

microActions.days30: Advocate for transparent rituals (decision logs, project updates, open Q&As)

scoringOptions.text: More trust — less micromanagement and control.

questions.question: How would you describe the impact your current leadership/manager has on your energy and confidence?

scoringOptions.text: They're inconsistent — some days empowering, some days draining.

scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a volatile Leader–Energy Story — your leader oscillates between empowering and draining, creating uncertainty in your work rhythm.

scoringOptions.text: They're demanding — growth happens but with emotional weight.

questions.question: When you reflect on your work and life, which statement feels most accurate?
questions.measure: Evaluates how closely your work matches your core beliefs, identity, and meaning.

scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a deeply harmonious Values–Identity Story — your daily work expresses your principles, beliefs, and inner compass.

scoringOptions.text: I feel disconnected — I need a deeper sense of direction.
scoringOptions.depiction: You feel disconnected from meaning — your inner compass needs recalibration.
scoringOptions.title: The Disconnection Phase: When Meaning Evaporates and Purpose Feels Distant
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your choice reflects a significant Values–Meaning Disconnection Story — you're operating, performing, delivering… but without emotional resonance.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone finding meaning through reconnection

microActions.hours24: Acknowledge the disconnection without judgment
microActions.days7: Revisit moments where you felt most alive
microActions.days30: Begin constructing a new purpose pathway

questions.question: How do you emotionally view your next big career change or reinvention?
questions.measure: Measures how emotionally and mentally prepared you are for major career change.

scoringOptions.text: Excited — I'm ready to leap.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're ready to leap — energy and clarity are aligned for a big change.
scoringOptions.title: The Leap Energy: When Your Future Pulls You Stronger Than Your Present Holds You
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a powerful Reinvention–Momentum Story — you're standing at the edge of a new chapter with excitement, not fear.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who moves with conviction and shapes opportunities

microActions.hours24: Capture the top 3 areas where you feel the strongest pull for reinvention
microActions.days7: Choose one direction and create a first-10-steps plan
microActions.days30: Execute a bold action — sign up, apply, build, launch, pitch, or collaborate

scoringOptions.text: Open — I'm eager to explore new directions.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're genuinely open to new paths — curiosity is guiding you forward.
scoringOptions.title: The Exploration Phase: When Curiosity Becomes Your Reinvention Compass
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a thoughtful Reinvention–Curiosity Story — you may not have chosen a specific path, but you're emotionally open to discovery.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who crafts career through exploration

microActions.hours24: Identify 2–3 potential reinvention possibilities that excite you
microActions.days7: Run micro-experiments — short learning bursts, conversations, role simulations
microActions.days30: Shortlist one direction that feels most alive

scoringOptions.text: Curious — I sense something bigger is calling me.
scoringOptions.depiction: You sense something bigger ahead — the spark of reinvention is alive.
scoringOptions.title: The Calling Whisper: When Reinvention Begins as a Feeling, Not a Plan
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a soulful Reinvention–Intuition Story — the next chapter isn't clear, but you can feel its presence.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who embodies larger, more meaningful version of themselves

microActions.hours24: Write the sensations — what bigger feels like for you
microActions.days7: Follow the intuitive breadcrumbs — people, ideas, industries that spark energy
microActions.days30: Shape a prototype of your bigger self

scoringOptions.text: Prepared — I've been building toward this.
scoringOptions.depiction: You've been building toward change — the groundwork is already in motion.
scoringOptions.title: The Readiness Phase: When Your Past Work Quietly Prepared You for a Bigger Chapter
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reflects a grounded Reinvention–Preparation Story — you're not leaping impulsively; you've been intentionally building for this moment.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who executes reinvention with mastery

microActions.hours24: List the top 3 capabilities you've built that signal readiness
microActions.days7: Identify the exact moment that should start your transition
microActions.days30: Launch your Reinvention Activation Plan

scoringOptions.text: Cautiously optimistic — I want to move, but with stability.
scoringOptions.depiction: You want change, but prefer stability as your safety net.
scoringOptions.title: The Balanced Reinventor: When Hope Meets Practicality
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a thoughtful Reinvention–Stability Story — you are open to change but equally anchored in the need for safety and control.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who transitions with elegance

microActions.hours24: Write down the exact risks you fear
microActions.days7: Design a Safety Net Blueprint — savings, skill gaps, fallback options
microActions.days30: Begin a low-risk reinvention experiment

scoringOptions.text: Undecided — I feel the shift coming but can't define it yet.
scoringOptions.depiction: You feel a shift coming, but the direction is still foggy.
scoringOptions.title: The Undefined Shift: When You Know Change Is Near, but Its Shape Is Still Forming
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reflects a subtle Reinvention–Ambiguity Story — your body, intuition, and mind sense change, but clarity hasn't arrived yet.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who finds clarity through exploration

microActions.hours24: Document the hints — conversations, ideas, skills, moments that spark curiosity
microActions.days7: Expose yourself to new worlds — industries, people, books, environments
microActions.days30: Shortlist 2–3 potential reinvention directions

scoringOptions.text: Anxious — too many unknowns, not enough clarity.
scoringOptions.depiction: The unknowns feel heavy — clarity must rise before momentum can build.
scoringOptions.title: The Overwhelm Zone: When Reinvention Feels Bigger Than Your Current Capacity
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals an honest Reinvention–Anxiety Story — you sense the need for change, but the ambiguity of the next step triggers turbulence.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who moves with confidence through clarity

microActions.hours24: Acknowledge your anxiety
microActions.days7: Break reinvention into micro-decisions
microActions.days30: Build a clarity map — options, risks, rewards

scoringOptions.text: Conflicted — part of me wants change, part of me resists.
scoringOptions.depiction: Part of you wants change; part resists — the tug-of-war is real.
scoringOptions.title: The Inner Tug-of-War: When Desire and Safety Pull You in Opposite Directions
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a powerful Reinvention–Duality Story — one part of you seeks growth; another part holds tightly to familiarity and safety.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who transforms while carrying forward the best

microActions.hours24: Write down the two parts of you
microActions.days7: Identify what the resisting part is protecting
microActions.days30: Design a hybrid transition

scoringOptions.text: Fearful — change feels overwhelming right now.
scoringOptions.depiction: Reinvention feels overwhelming — fear is louder than possibility right now.
scoringOptions.title: The Fear Barrier: When Reinvention Feels Like a Threat Instead of an Opportunity
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a raw Reinvention–Fear Story — you're not resisting change; you're afraid of its magnitude, consequences, or emotional demands.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who transforms once fear is replaced with clarity

microActions.hours24: Identify the exact fear
microActions.days7: Reduce fear through exposure — learn, observe, analyse
microActions.days30: Build a Safety Layer

scoringOptions.text: Stuck — I know I need reinvention, but don't know where to begin.
scoringOptions.depiction: You know change is needed, but you don't know how to begin — stuck at the starting line.
scoringOptions.title: The Inertia Loop: When You Want Change but Can't Find the Starting Point
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a relatable Reinvention–Stagnation Story — the desire for change is real, but the starting line is invisible.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who gains momentum through small steps

microActions.hours24: Identify one area of your life or career that feels most misaligned
microActions.days7: Take the smallest possible action
microActions.days30: Build a Reinvention Momentum Loop

questions.question: If fear, money, and expectations were removed, what would you love your life's work to express?
questions.measure: Reveals your deepest passion signature and how clearly it aligns with future identity.

scoringOptions.text: Creativity — building, designing, expressing ideas.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your soul speaks through creation — imagination is your native language.
scoringOptions.title: The Creative Identity: Your Soul Speaks Through What You Make
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a profound Creative–Purpose Story — you feel most alive when your inner world takes shape through ideas, structures, visuals, products, or concepts.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone who leads through innovation and artistic intelligence

microActions.hours24: Capture one idea you've been holding back
microActions.days7: Build a tiny prototype
microActions.days30: Launch a creative project

scoringOptions.text: Impact — improving lives and contributing meaningfully.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're wired to improve lives — meaning drives your future more than title.
scoringOptions.title: The Impact Identity: You Are Wired for Significance, Not Just Success
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a powerful Impact–Purpose Story — you feel fulfilled when your work leaves people, systems, or communities better than before.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone leading with conscience

microActions.hours24: Identify one person or group you can meaningfully help today
microActions.days7: Start a micro-initiative — mentoring, teaching, volunteering
microActions.days30: Design an impact blueprint

scoringOptions.text: Mastery — becoming exceptional in a craft or skill.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're built to become world-class — depth and discipline define your path.
scoringOptions.title: The Mastery Path: You're Meant to Become World-Class at Something
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a compelling Mastery–Identity Story — you're driven by the desire to excel deeply, not broadly.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone becoming the go-to expert

microActions.hours24: Identify the craft or skill you're instinctively drawn to deepen
microActions.days7: Create a daily or weekly mastery ritual
microActions.days30: Enroll in a mastery pathway

scoringOptions.text: Freedom — working on my terms, in my rhythm.
scoringOptions.depiction: You thrive when you choose your rhythm — autonomy is your highest currency.
scoringOptions.title: The Freedom Blueprint: You Are Meant to Build a Life, Not Just a Career
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a deeply personal Freedom–Identity Story — structure or rigidity drains you, while autonomy energizes you.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone defining pace, priorities, and projects

microActions.hours24: Identify one area where you can reclaim autonomy
microActions.days7: Create a personal workflow supporting your natural rhythm
microActions.days30: Build or explore a freedom-oriented pathway

scoringOptions.text: Leadership — guiding people, shaping systems.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're meant to guide people and shape systems — influence is your calling.
scoringOptions.title: The Leadership Calling: Your Influence Is Not Accidental—It's Inherent
scoringOptions.archetype: The Guided Leader in the Making
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a compelling Leadership–Purpose Story — you're drawn to guide people, shape culture, influence direction, and leave a mark beyond individual contribution.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone in visible leadership roles

microActions.hours24: Notice where people already come to you for direction
microActions.days7: Claim a leadership micro-space
microActions.days30: Start crafting your leadership brand

scoringOptions.text: Innovation — solving problems and inventing possibilities.
scoringOptions.depiction: Your mind thinks in future tense — you're a natural builder of new ideas.
scoringOptions.title: The Innovation Drive: You Think in Possibilities, Not Limitations
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a powerful Innovation–Identity Story — you're energized by challenges that require imagination, experimentation, and bold thinking.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone shaping the future of industries

microActions.hours24: Identify a problem that frustrates you
microActions.days7: Build a small prototype, model, or experiment
microActions.days30: Launch an innovation project

scoringOptions.text: Learning — teaching, mentoring, sharing knowledge.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're motivated by knowledge — teaching and mentoring light your inner fire.
scoringOptions.title: The Wisdom Path: You Are Wired to Grow and Help Others Grow
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a meaningful Learning–Purpose Story — growth energizes you, and teaching feels natural because knowledge is your generosity.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone guiding and facilitating others

microActions.hours24: Share one insight or resource with someone who needs it
microActions.days7: Offer a mentoring session or lead a short learning circle
microActions.days30: Start a knowledge platform

scoringOptions.text: Adventure — exploring spaces, industries, new worlds.
scoringOptions.depiction: You're drawn to new worlds — experiences, industries, and environments energize you.
scoringOptions.title: The Explorer's Spirit: You Are Designed for Movement, Discovery, and Expansion
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reflects an adventurous Exploration–Identity Story — monotony suffocates you; novelty awakens you.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone with life filled with new experiences

microActions.hours24: Explore one new topic, space, or environment you've never considered
microActions.days7: Break routine
microActions.days30: Plan a larger exploration experiment

scoringOptions.text: Service — helping others find clarity, direction, hope.
scoringOptions.depiction: Helping others find direction or hope is your quiet superpower.
scoringOptions.title: The Service Compass: You Are Built to Be a Light for Others
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your response reveals a deeply heartfelt Service–Purpose Story — fulfilment comes when you guide, uplift, or support others through confusion or struggle.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone in service-oriented leadership or coaching

microActions.hours24: Offer support to someone who is emotionally or mentally stuck
microActions.days7: Facilitate a clarity conversation or reflective session
microActions.days30: Build a service pathway

scoringOptions.text: Legacy — creating something enduring beyond myself.
scoringOptions.depiction: You want your life's work to outlive you — legacy matters more than applause.
scoringOptions.title: The Legacy Drive: Your Work Is a Bridge Between Your Life and the Future
scoringOptions.keyInsight: Your answer reveals a profound Legacy–Purpose Story — you want your work to outlive you, touch people you may never meet, and leave a mark that shapes the future.
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: Someone creating institutions, movements, or enduring frameworks

microActions.hours24: Define what legacy means to you
microActions.days7: Start documenting your wisdom, frameworks, or methods
microActions.days30: Begin a legacy-building project

scoringMatrix.description: Universal scoring scale applied to all questions

expandableFields.description: To expand scoring for additional questions, follow this structure:

scoringOptions.depiction: SHORT_STATEMENT
scoringOptions.title: FULL_TITLE
scoringOptions.keyInsight: DETAILED_EXPLANATION
scoringOptions.futureArchetype: NEXT_EVOLUTION

microActions.hours24: ACTION
microActions.days7: ACTION
microActions.days30: ACTION
